## Project Goals

- Identify top global and regional artists and tracks
- Explore how audio features (e.g., valence, danceability) vary over time
- Understand how closely countries' charts align with global rankings
- Build an interactive, user-friendly exploration tool

---

## Data Sources

Dataset: **Top Spotify Songs in 73 Countries (Daily Updated)**  
Source: `Kaggle`

- ~1.9 million rows
- 73 countries, daily snapshots
- Key fields:
  - track name, artists, country, snapshot_date
  - Audio features: valence, danceability, energy, etc.
  - Popularity scores and stream counts

---

## Key Features of the App

<div class="columns">

<div class="column" style="font-size: 0.75em;width: 40%">

**Three-tab layout:**

- **Global Overview**  
  View global top artists/tracks and chart alignment maps.
- **Regional Deep Dive**  
  Country-specific trends and global overlap over time.
- **Audio Feature Explorer**  
  Feature trends and regional “sound profiles”.

</div>

## Design Choices

- Artists ranked by **appearance count**; tracks by **Spotify popularity score**
- Choropleth map to visualize **global-local alignment**
- Time series plots for trend discovery
- Radar charts to represent regional "sound shapes"
- Custom date filters for deeper, user-defined exploration

---

## Key Outcomes - Music

<div class="columns">

<div class="column" style="font-size: 0.75em;width: 40%">

- **Bad Bunny** and **Kendrick Lamar** consistently dominate global charts.
- **India** and **Nigeria** avor local artists over global hits.
- **US**,**Canada** and **Australia* closely match global trends.

</div>

<div class="column" style="width: 60%">

![Dashboard Overview](global_music_plots.png)

</div>

</div>

---

## Key Outcomes - Audio Feature 

<div class="columns">

<div class="column" style="font-size: 0.75em;width: 40%">

- **Valence** spikes in December, likely from upbeat holiday music.
- **Danceability** and **energy** stay steady but vary slightly across countries.
- Radar charts reveal regional “sound profiles” at a glance.
- Audio features help explain not just who’s popular, but what sounds resonate.

</div>

<div class="column" style="width: 60%">

![Dashboard Overview](audio_feature_plots.png)

</div>

</div>

- Discovered meaningful musical trends through interactive design
